name: AMAZING BEAST FROG: BATTLE
description:
HARDCORE OPEN-WORLD GAMEPLAY

The mighty city was overwhelmed by the funny mutant frogs. But one of them is good who wants to protect the city and save the population. This is YOU! Use your lightsaber to defeat as many enemies as you can! Try to set more and more bigger record.


Features:
-funny physics
-crazy characters
-cool effects
